item.description:
Come join us for a nice autumn hike...and see the beautiful foliage that are starting to bloom this time of the year. We had the same hike last year, so you can look at the photos for more info...

Please pack your own lunch and plenty of water. We will have a small picnic once we reach the top of the mountain so everyone can relax and enjoy the view. 

 

Carpools - If you need a carpool please indicate which T stop and/or town you are coming from. One of our members may be able to give you a ride. If you can provide a carpool please indicate the same as above.

Update - We will gather at the parking lot (free) where the trail begins. The hike will begin promptly at 12:00 pm, so please don’t be late. There might be traffic going up north during foliage season, so it may not be a bad idea to get a head start. The hike is intended to be 3-4 hours to allow  everyone times to enjoy the view, take pictures, and eat lunch at the top. Looks like we are blessed with great weather this weekend so hope to see you all there!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Autumn Hike & Beautiful Foliage
